text: 13.12 Mat 18.10, 2 Ko 3.18, 5.7, Plp 3.12, Jem 1.23, 1 Jo 3.2 Mɨñɨl God tap ne wɨdɨn nopun okok, nɨgtep ma gɨl, ñɨg kawnan pag nepal tek ak nopun ak pen, kɨdek God nop jomulɨk ak penpen nɨgɨnɨgabun. Mɨñɨl God tap ne gos nopun okok, dayday tek nopun ak pen, kɨdek God chɨnop mɨñɨl nɨgtep gup tek, nop nɨgtep gɨnɨgabun.
